verses.verse: Afterward he <S%H3212>brought<s%> me to the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, even the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>:

And, behold, the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6921>east<s%>: and his <S%H6963>voice<s%> was like a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>: and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H215>shined<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And it was according to the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision<s%> which I <S%H7200>saw<s%>, even according to the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> when I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and the <S%H4759>visions<s%> were like the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>; and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>.

So the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> took me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>; and, behold, the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto me out of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by <S%H681>me<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, where I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, shall the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> no more <S%H2930>defile<s%>, neither they, nor their <S%H4428>kings<s%>, by their <S%H2184>whoredom<s%>, nor by the <S%H6297>carcases<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%> in their high <S%H1116>places<s%>.

In their <S%H5414>setting<s%> of their <S%H5592>threshold<s%> by my <S%H5592>thresholds<s%>, and their <S%H4201>post<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> my <S%H4201>posts<s%>, and the <S%H7023>wall<s%> between me and them, they have even <S%H2930>defiled<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that they have <S%H6213>committed<s%>: wherefore I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>.

Now let them put <S%H7368>away<s%> their <S%H2184>whoredom<s%>, and the <S%H6297>carcases<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%>, <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

¶ Thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5046>shew<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they may be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>: and let them <S%H4058>measure<s%> the <S%H8508>pattern<s%>.

And if they be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of all that they have <S%H6213>done<s%>, <S%H3045>shew<s%> them the <S%H6699>form<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H8498>fashion<s%> thereof, and the goings <S%H4161>out<s%> thereof, and the <S%H4126>comings<s%> in thereof, and all the <S%H6699>forms<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H6699>forms<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H8451>laws<s%> thereof: and <S%H3789>write<s%> it in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, that they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the whole <S%H6699>form<s%> thereof, and all the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> thereof, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; Upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the whole <S%H1366>limit<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>. Behold, this is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

¶ And these are the <S%H4060>measures<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> after the <S%H520>cubits<s%>: The <S%H520>cubit<s%> is a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and an hand <S%H2948>breadth<s%>; even the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> shall be a <S%H520>cubit<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof by the <S%H8193>edge<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> shall be <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2239>span<s%>: and this shall be the higher <S%H1354>place<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And from the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%> even to the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H5835>settle<s%> shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%>; and from the <S%H6996>lesser<s%> <S%H5835>settle<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H5835>settle<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> one <S%H520>cubit<s%>.
So the <S%H741%H2025>altar<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and from the <S%H741>altar<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%>.

And the <S%H741>altar<s%> shall be <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%>, <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, <S%H7251>square<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>squares<s%> thereof.

And the <S%H5835>settle<s%> shall be <S%H702%H6240>fourteen<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H702%H6240>fourteen<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>squares<s%> thereof; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> it shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%>; and the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> thereof shall be a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%>; and his <S%H4609>stairs<s%> shall <S%H6437>look<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; These are the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it, to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> thereon, and to <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereon.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that be of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, which <S%H7138>approach<s%> unto me, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, a <S%H1121%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it, and on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H5835>settle<s%>, and upon the <S%H1366>border<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: thus shalt thou <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> and <S%H3722>purge<s%> it.

Thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> also of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it in the appointed <S%H4662>place<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.

And on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>; and they shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, as they did <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> it with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>.

When thou hast made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2398>cleansing<s%> it, thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H1121%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H4417>salt<s%> upon them, and they shall offer them <S%H5927>up<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>prepare<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>: they shall also <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H1121%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall they <S%H3722>purge<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H2891>purify<s%> it; and they shall consecrate <S%H4390%H3027>themselves<s%>.

And when these <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H3615>expired<s%>, it shall be, that upon the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and so <S%H1973>forward<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and your peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>; and I will <S%H7521>accept<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
